isaiah

import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { HttpService } from "src/app/services/http.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-home", templateUrl: "./home.component.html", styleUrls: ["./home.component.css"], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { public customers: any[] = []; public isLoading = false; constructor(private http: HttpService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getCustomers(); } getCustomers() { console.log("RANNN"); this.http.get("/customers", (data: any) => { this.isLoading = true; if (data.success) { this.isLoading = false; console.log("data", data.data); this.customers = data.data; } }); } }
